dmca.title: TV DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market
dmca.sender_name: Golenbock Eiseman Assor Bell & Peskoe LLP

works.description:
The copyrighted work is Wizards of the
Coast LLC's MAGIC: THE GATHERING® (commonly referred to as “MTG”) trading
card game. The game includes copyrighted images of hundreds of trading
cards and their associated creative content (text, artwork, symbols,
trademarks) and the complex game rules.
